Title: Condor Project Homepage
Body: Date: Thu, 07 Nov 1996 19:23:34 GMT Server: NCSA/1.5 Content-type: text/html Last-modified: Sun, 27 Oct 1996 22:31:01 GMT Content-length: 1840 Condor Project Homepage Objective: The goal of the Condor project is to develop, implement, deploy, and evaluate mechanisms and policies that support High Throughput Computing (HTC) on large collections of distributively owned computing resources.
